description: "Routes of W.R.D. Beckett between Sisophon (Cambodia) and Korat, and Korat and Nongkhai (both Thailand) are marked on these two maps, with lacquer trees, paddy fields, bog iron, salt fields shown. The heights of locations along the route are recorded."
title: "Sketch of route from Sisophon to Korat and from Korat to Nongkhai [showing the route of Mr. W.R.D. Beckett] [cartographic material]."
